    This Dot & Key’s ACTIVE Hair Treatment Mask is formulated with high-performance actives like Pea Peptide Protein, Hydrolyzed Keratin and Linoleic Acid and plant-nutrients like Argan Oil & Moringa Seed Oil and Shea butter.  

    • Stimulates hair follicle stem cells to strengthen hair & reduce hair fall.
    • Intensively nourishes the hair from root to tip, and promotes new hair growth.
    • Reduces breakage while adding strength to weak and thinning hair.
    • Argan oil infused to add shine and volume to dull limp hair.

    THE SCIENCE BEHIND
    Our Formulations
    Our Formulations are 90% nature derived, with our focus being the use of scientifically-proven ingredients that ensure promised results.
    Moringa seed oil
    to Strengthen
    Moringa Seed Oil is rich in zinc that boosts natural keratin production in hair to strengthen limp, lifeless hair. It also activates dormant hair follicles to enhance hair growth. Moringa-infused haircare is also rich in omega-3 fatty acid which over-coats the hair cortex to lock in moisture. Behenic Acid in Moringa Seed Oil makes the hair lustrous & soft.
    Argan Oil
    to Fight Breakage
    A known hydrator & a natural source of Vitamin E, it strengthens weak & damaged hair. It increases the hair elasticity to prevent rough breakage while restoring volume to dull, lifeless hair. It also contains fatty acids that naturally moisturize & lubricate the hair giving it a healthy lustre and shine.
    Linoleic Acid
    to Balance Hair Growth
    Linoleic Acid keeps the scalp hydrated & healthy. It rebalances the hair growth cycle which in turn gives you strong and thick hair, hence reducing hair fall and loss.
    Shea Butter
    to Lock Moisture
    Shea Butter, full fatty acids is an extremely moisturizing ingredient that can make dry, damaged hair super soft. It acts as a sealant to lock in moisture to reduce dryness & prevent split ends. It can also shield the hair from heat & styling damage.
    Murumuru Butter
    for Hair Elasticity
    Its moisturizing properties soften hair by locking in moisture inside the hair strands. It is a great emollient which maintains hair elasticity & protect the hair strands from breakage.
    Pea peptide Protein
    to Resist Hair Loss
    A rich source of amino acid, pea-peptide protein stimulates & strengthens hair follicle cells to resist hair loss. The reconstructive properties of pea peptide forms a film over hair slowing down moisture loss from the hair, keeping it hydrated, healthy & less prone to breakage. In addition, pea peptides also acts as a superfood for the scalp nourishing it for supersoft, silky smooth hair.
    Hydrolyzed Keratin
    to Replace Missing Keratin
    Keratin is a protein naturally found in the hair, a deficiency of which can cause hair thinning & loss. Infusion of hydrolyzed keratin to the hair helps to strengthen the hair shaft & reduce hair loss from breakage. Hydrolyzed keratin is a large protein molecule broken down to penetrate the hair cuticle. Topical application of hydrolyzed keratin creates a protective barrier on the hair to strengthen brittle, thin & limp hair by penetrating the hair shaft to replace missing or damaged keratin. Reduces hair breakage by minimizing cuticle damage, and increases hair elasticity.

    Full Ingredients List
    Aqua, Glycerine, Polyquaternium-37 (and) Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate (and) Trideceth-6, Macadamia Ternifolia (Macadamia) Seed Oil, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil, Silanetriol (and) Hyaluronic Acid, Laminaria digitata extract (and) Cetyl - PG Hydroxyethyl palmitate (and) Ceramide 1 (and) Ceramide 2 (and) Ceramide 3 (and) Ceramide 4 (and) Ceramide 6 II, Hydrolyzed Quinoa, Wheat Amino Acids (and) Soy Amino Acids (and) Arginine HCl (and) Serine (and) Threonine, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Dimethylsilanol Hyaluronate, Panthenyl Hydroxypropyl Steardimonium Chloride, Polyquaternium-10, Tocopheryl Acetate, Disodium EDTA, Benzyl Alcohol (and) Ethylhexylglycerin (and) Tocopherol, IFRA Certified Allergen Free Fragrance.
    How To Use
    This post-shampoo hair mask also doubles up as a weekly pre-shampoo deep conditioning treatment. Apply on scalp and hair, and leave it on for 20 minutes before you rinse it off. Follow it with shampoo & all your regular stuff.

    FAQ
    1. Is Pea Peptide Strengthening Moringa & Argan Hair Mask suitable for curly hair?
    A. It is safe for curly hair to use Peptide Strengthening Moringa & Argan Hair Mask. This hair mask is also suitable for coloured and chemically treated hair.
    2. Can I use Peptide Strengthening Moringa & Argan Hair Mask as a pre-shampoo conditioning treatment?
    A. Yes, Peptide Strengthening Moringa & Argan Hair Mask can double up as a weekly pre-shampoo deep conditioning treatment. Simply apply the hair mask from the mid-length to the ends of your hair and let it sit for 20 minutes before you rinse and shampoo.
    3. Is this hair mask silicone-free?
    A. Peptide Strengthening Moringa & Argan Hair Mask is silicone-free. It is also free of sulphate, dye, and synthetic fragrance, making it safer for hair.
    4. Will Peptide Strengthening Moringa & Argan Hair Mask make my hair voluminous?
    A. This hair mask is clinically proven to give 12.7X Stronger Hair and 30X Frizz Reduction. It effectively lowers hair fall, making hair voluminous.
    5. I have dull and brittle hair. Can I use this hair mask?
    A. The thoughtfully curated formulations of Peptide Strengthening Moringa & Argan Hair Mask is effective in tackling hair woes associated with dull, dry, brittle hair, and thinning hair.
